title: Finbars1234*
author: Finbars1234*
content: My name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Learning Resourceshttps://learnmeabitcoin.com/Bitcoin Information and Resources: https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information.htmlBooksMastering bitcoin. If you are not good enough with English, try with Translations of Mastering BitcoinMastering the Lightning NetworkThe Internet of Money and its websiteBitcoins Related BooksLittlebitcoinbookYoutube channelsAntonopoulos' Youtube channelBitcoin for Beginners: Intro to Bitcoin, Satoshi, Mining and moreBitcoin Q&A

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Apart from the useful information provided by tranthidung, I would recommend you to visit the technical sections of the forum, because if you are a software developer you will not find it too difficult to understand what is discussed there (many people on the forum find it difficult) and you will see that there are much more serious discussions than in other sections.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Just a heads up: don't make the same mistake with a lot of people by going into trading immediately.* If you like reading articles: https://coindesk.com/learn* If you like reading books: https://theinternetofmoney.info/* If you like watching videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9NnjSecurity related:* https://cryptosec.info* https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information/security.htmlIf you want to get more technical* https://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbook#chapters

comments.author: Lida93
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.No doubt you're in the right place as long as Bitcoin is concerned. For there is a plethora of articles and books you can make use of here in as much as you are ready to read and learn.I have been making use of these links below in my journey to more knowledge about Bitcoin and it has been really helpful, and am sure you will benefit too.1> Specifically for newbie's:https://learnmeabitcoin.com/https://aantonop.com/books/iom/2> Beginners guide on trading in Bitcoin:https://academy.binance.com/en/articles/a-complete-guide-to-cryptocurrency-trading-for-beginners3Another BitcoinÂ  beginners guide for you:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4928968.0

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, hope you would have a great time here.It's great you have a learning span already, this would make it easier for you to adequately utilize the resources available to you here on the forum. It can be a little overwhelming, with the multiple links provided here (and more which would likely be added) and thousands of posts on the forum.Understand that no one here knows everything, so take it a step at a time.Find your interests and best ways to learn, then leverage on that. Good Luck.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.First of all Congratulation mate on finding your way to this community. Seeing that so many useful information have been given to you already, I will like to encourage you to take your time to read through the forum rules even as you learn from other members who have been here before you so that you don't go against the rules. Secondly, I will advise you to read more and ask questions about the things you don't understand instead of creating multiple threads as a newbie and don't forget to make proper research and findings before engaging in any form of transaction with anyone here, good luck.

comments.author: Gosgosking
comments.body: You are welcome mate. The forum is all about learning about bitcoin and cryptocurrencies related, everything depends on you. Learning new things about bitcoin depends on how focused and consistent you will be, if you are serious about learning it won't take a long time for you to be brushed up .

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMPlease I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Of course in this forum you will get all information about Bitcoin development, mining, trading, investment and so on related to Bitcoin, You are sure to be helped by the members here, if you ask and want to discuss it.@tranthidung & @mk4 already pointed out some things for you to learn, maybe it will be useful for you, for that if you want to also discuss about development & Technical you can visit here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=6.0, there you will find more information about Bitcoin, good luck with your endeavors.

comments.author: First Registration
comments.body: Your thoughts are very good. As much as you know, there is much more to know. Actually this forum is created to know about sudu crypto market. And if you spend more time here, you can learn a lot. As far as I know, any question can be answered here. That's why I call this forum the best.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: This forum is also a great source of learning about Crypto and Blockchain technology.You just need to be active in this forum by reading articles and searching your desired topics. Best wishes for you.

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Since you are already a software dev, I don't think you will have a hard time catching real quick. For most of us without any technical knowledge, it was a bit confusing, but key is to have a open mind and be willing to learn.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Since you're a software developer I believe it will be easy for you to fit in and easily catch up with the system operation (which I believe you're relating the forum here).The forum is welcoming to every new user and crypto-related business but the rules are not to be broken and that's the important area I believe you need to learn.Welcome to the forum.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: suzanne5223 on August 15, 2022, 08:21:10 PMQuote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Since you're a software developer I believe it will be easy for you to fit in and easily catch up with the system operation (which I believe you're relating the forum here).The forum is welcoming to every new user and crypto-related business but the rules are not to be broken and that's the important area I believe you need to learn.Welcome to the forum.Yeah right, skill in coding plus technical knowledge on crypto which I doubt is the only OP need.Technical knowledge is on the internet and it's everywhere that you can obtain since you already know about coding it's easy for you to understand and pursue your goal as a developer. All information was given above, just have research on it, everything is on the internet and sometimes you need a Google search to answer your question or the best is since you're here in the forum, don't be shy to ask a question.Â  Glad to hear someone like you here in the community.

comments.author: alik111
comments.body: As a new user firstly you have to learn about forum rules and have to know how this forum work for beginners. In this forum everyone will help you about what you want to learn. You should find out forum rules at the top of the every section.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Welcome to the forum mate and you have reached the best place over the internet for bitcoin related discussion and enhancing your knowledge learning from the high rank and knowledgeable members here providing with legitimate information about bitcoin stuff.As you have been already provided with the links above for different resources to aid you in the learning process you will definitely get lot of information through them but the important one out of them on which you should focus are :Mastering Bitcoin by Andreas that will take you on the ride from complete beginner to someone who has adequate knowledge about bitcoin including the technical stuff also like the wallets, transactions,UTXO,keys,master and child keys as it covers all the topics.Rest this forum is great library of resources you can explore according to your preference and topics you want to learn.But if you are looking for some specific topic on the forum then use google optimized search that can help you a lot :Code: Bitcoin hardware wallets bitcointalk.orgLightning network bitcointalk.org You will get list of threads having the same discussion and you can go through them to have knowledge about that topic and being a software developer you will find it easy to understand the technical terms and background working so go through it.

comments.author: Finbars1234*
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on August 15, 2022, 05:27:30 AMQuote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Apart from the useful information provided by tranthidung, I would recommend you to visit the technical sections of the forum, because if you are a software developer you will not find it too difficult to understand what is discussed there (many people on the forum find it difficult) and you will see that there are much more serious discussions than in other sections. Thank you so much for this useful links shown to me. I've gone through them thoroughly, and know I have cleared myself off the confusions I had before. I still have couple more questions, but I think it's best I put it in discussion, and as time goes on, I hope to relate well so far as bitcoin is concerned.Thanks also to all that helped with little advice and useful tips for me too. I'm happy to be among this community, and I really appreciate your contributions..

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: Finbars1234* on August 15, 2022, 05:06:54 AMMy name is Finbar, I'm a software developer. I'm enthusiastic about bitcoin, and I want to learn more on how the system operates. Got introduced by my friend, but still a little bit confused. But I believe within a year or two here, I'll be brushed up. Please I need little cooperation with you guys, to help me achieve this goal, Thanks.Good day OP welcome to bitcointalk.org forum.If you are looking for the source of knowledge then I'll tell you that you are in a good and right place because here in forum you can learn a lot of things interms of bitcoins, how it works and and also about Blockchain what other users do above they gave you a link which is you can start learning . And based on what you said you are a software developer for sure you can learn faster.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Victorik on August 15, 2022, 06:14:40 PMSince you are already a software dev, I don't think you will have a hard time catching real quick. For most of us without any technical knowledge, it was a bit confusing, but key is to have a open mind and be willing to learn.Take note that understanding Bitcoin's technical stuff is just one(albeit hugely important) thing, while understanding Bitcoin in the context of markets and economics is a whole other beast.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Keep yourself active at bitcointalk then eventually you will learn more, you can engage in the discussion and express your opinions or ask queries and get responses from different people so that's it, here you can learn from others and share what you have got.
